channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Storm of Suspicion
channel.desc: Stephanie Bruner vanished after telling her husband Dale she needed a walk. Days later, her body was found in the icy Blue River frozen, beaten, and strangled. Police uncovered a web of secrets: a failed affair, financial stress, and a retracted restraining order against Dale. With no forensic evidence, Dale's violent past and motive led to his indictment eight months later.
